title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: UDL Framework for Designing Inclusive Science Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Propose at least three strategies for applying the three UDL framework principles (engagement, representation, action & expression) to science lessons.
Design science laboratory activities that accommodate diverse learner needs, to be implemented at least once.

Learners will create an inclusive learning material development plan incorporating three or more digital (images, videos) and analog (text, print) resources that address diverse learners, including people with disabilities and the elderly. The plan must meet four or more of five WCAG 2.1 accessibility criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
